__e: He does to those bastards what me and you can only fantasize about.
I told them I could think of at least six sons of bitches who've got a mind to see you dead but that it'd be more fun to sit back and take bets on who gets you first.
I get why you want to track down Jackson as he and his crazy father are the bastards who started this all, but you can't solve all the world's problems.
